Key Match Events: Hardik, Bumrah and Siraj strike at regular intervals
Gareth Delany scored 26 runs off 14 balls with 2 fours and 2 sixes
Virat Kohli sliced a short ball to deep third man
Rohit Sharma reached his 30th T20I fifty
Rohit retired hurt after being struck on the shoulder
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma expressed pride in the team's performance
The coach highlighted the victory as a good start to the tournament
Miscellaneous Highlights: Runs came at a premium due to the uneven bounce and exaggerated movement of the pitch
The big crowd, made up primarily of Indian fans, left the stadium happy
